item.title: Trump’s JFK Files Release Is About Restoring Americans’ Trust In Government
item.description: The release of the JFK files was never about solving a conspiracy. It was about ushering in a new era of government transparency.

item.title: There’s Absolutely Nothing But Politics To The Time-Wasting Signal Chat Hullabaloo
item.description: The chat should not have included a journalist, but the error pales in comparison to other egregious acts from Washington's elected leaders.

item.title: U.S. Supreme Court Takes Up Wisconsin Ruling Stripping Tax Exemption From Christian Nonprofit
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court should overturn the opinion from Wisconsin’s high court and protect the First Amendment rights of all ministries.

item.title: America’s Librarians Became Militantly Political, And Now They Suffer The Consequences
item.description: America's librarians elected a Marxist to represent them and staked their reputation on providing explicitly sexual material to kids. It's no surprise...

item.title: Trump Urges Votes For Conservative WI Supreme Court Candidate Ahead Of Pivotal Election
item.description: 'I’m asking everyone to get out and vote for a great American patriot, tough-on-crime Brad Schimel,' Trump said during Thursday's tele-rally.
